1.text: Mix together equal amounts of white school glue and water.

2.text: Add some food coloring or glitter if desired.

3.text: Stir in 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) of liquid laundry detergent with a fork.

4.text: Knead the slime with your hands for 1 to 2 minutes.

5.text: Play with the slime, then store it in an airtight container.

6.text: Pour 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) of clear school glue into a bowl.

7.text: Use a fork to stir in 2 teaspoons of liquid laundry detergent.

8.text: Add in 1 more teaspoon of liquid laundry detergent and stir again.

9.text: Knead the slime by hand for about 1 to 2 minutes.

10.text: Add some shaving cream for fluffy slime if desired.

11.text: Play with the slime, then store it in an airtight container.
